post.name: New website why?
post.postbody: The reason we have a new website is because this is for people with slow devices so this should load faster than our other website

post.name: Enchantments mod:
post.postbody: Description: This is a mod that adds enchantment to minecraft PE

post.name: Single player commands
post.postbody: Description: This adds mod hads tons of commands to MCPE 9.5

post.name: Iron man mod:
post.postbody: Description: this mod adds th iron man suit which can be crafted by materials found in your world also adds different abilities and jarvis ect.

post.name: Jack frost mod
post.postbody: Description: This is a very intersting mod once enabled you can walk around an the ice placment is similar to midas touch but off a bit it will start to build stair cases. And anything you click will get a layer of snow on it ect

post.name: Auto torch mod
post.postbody: Dscription: this is self explaining, When you walk around every 30 - 45 seconds a torch will b placed. Great for mining
